categories: Stripes Hiker Micro Crew Cushion Socks
description: Cushioned wool socks that stand up to multi-day backpacking trips. The wool blend keeps them itch-free and lets your feet breathe. Seamless construction provides a smooth fit and ensures no slipping, no bunching and no blisters.Made of fine-gauge merino wool, nylon and spandex to keep your feet cool in the summer, warm in winter.Merino is naturally antimicrobial to prevent your feet from getting funky.True Seamless™ construction fuses seams for chafe-free wear.Darn Tough sources its wool from non-mulesed sheep.
name: Darn Tough Stripes Hiker Micro Crew Cushion Socks - Women's
